message: I'll take the lion's share, but I'm willing to give you a small taste. Accept this and we both get something.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give you the whole pie
Let's be reasonable here. I'm still willing to share, but I need a better deal than your last offer.  Take it or leave it.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up too much
I'm starting to get impatient. This is my final offer. Take it, or we both risk losing everything.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up too much more
This is it, Bob. I'm not budging anymore.  Take this, or we both walk away with nothing. Time is running out.
